channel.title: Templates on Co-pilot-cli
channel.description: Recent content in Templates on Co-pilot-cli

item.title: Ignores
item.description: During the merge process of a template into a target directory, co-pilot by default reads the .gitignore file from the template, and ignores all the files matching. In addition a co-pilot.ignore file can be added for file which should exist in the version control, but not be part of the template during merging. Example .co-pilot.ignore FooController.kt Example .gitignore HELP.md target/ !.mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar !**/src/main/**/target/ !**/src/test/**/target/ ### STS ### .apt_generated .classpath .factorypath .project .

item.title: Basics
item.description: Templates are added to the cloud-config repo under a templates folder. Example Filetypes Filetypes in templates are .kt and .java files If a template supplies a .kt or a .java file, the file is copied to its right destination and the package com.example... line in top of the file is replaced to support the target. I with the same path and filename is found in the target, the file is ignored.
